name: Sticky Sword Stick Man
description:
Lore

You are a trained warrior with a sword that can chop down any enemy.

Unfortunately, you can't keep your sword clean and your enemies keep sticking to it.

Controls

WASD to move.

J and L to swing your sword.

Gameplay

Spoiler on some of the details of the mechanics if the game didn't explain it well enough.

----

Whenever your sword is green, enemies will stick to it, other enemies will stick to those enemies, and so on and so forth.

Whenever your sword is grey (usually from cleaning it with water), enemies will die when hit by it and enemies that are stuck to it.

Whenever your sword hits a water drop, it will clean and go to grey. Enemies stuck won't unstick.

Bombs can explode some of the enemies stuck to your sword in a specific way (to avoid any weird interactions. Sorry).

Bullets that come from enemies stuck to your sword can deal damage to enemies and you.

Credits and Other Stuff

Credit to khiou for some of the pixel art. Love you man.

Credit to myself for the background music. Will update here when it's available for the world to hear.

This game was made for the GMTK 2021 game jam. Good luck to all other participants.
